1708.verse: الٓمٓر‌ۚ|Alif Laam Mim Ra.|135|156|9311$تِلْكَ|These|60|102|1038$ءَايَـٰتُ|(are) the Verses|129|171|2243$ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ‌ۗ|(of) the Book.|113|155|811$وَٱلَّذِىٓ|And that which|121|142|6481$أُنزِلَ|has been revealed|141|152|44$إِلَيْكَ|to you|63|86|45$مِن|from|50|72|53$رَّبِّكَ|your Lord|82|104|1322$ٱلْحَقُّ|(is) the truth,|112|134|268$وَلَـٰكِنَّ|but|78|100|952$أَكْثَرَ|most|64|75|2155$ٱلنَّاسِ|(of) the mankind|130|226|75$لَا|(do) not|75|268|30$يُؤْمِنُونَ|believe.|94|190|35$

1709.verse: ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|63|123$ٱلَّذِى|(is) the One Who|134|154|138$رَفَعَ|raised|59|80|9312$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|136|351$بِغَيْرِ|without|70|90|612$عَمَدٍ|pillars|61|82|9313$تَرَوْنَهَا‌ۖ|that you see,|110|120|9314$ثُمَّ|then|50|57|293$ٱسْتَوَىٰ|He established|116|131|301$عَلَى|on|63|78|52$ٱلْعَرْشِ‌ۖ|the Throne|93|108|6451$وَسَخَّرَ|and subjected|114|129|9315$ٱلشَّمْسَ|the sun|90|105|5758$وَٱلْقَمَرَ‌ۖ|and the moon|111|118|5865$كُلٌّ|each|52|63|1081$يَجْرِى|running|81|104|9316$لِأَجَلٍ|for a term|86|108|8743$مُّسَمًّى‌ۚ|appointed,|90|112|5411$يُدَبِّرُ|He arranges|99|122|8011$ٱلْأَمْرَ|the matter;|97|120|3406$يُفَصِّلُ|He details|85|96|8024$ٱلْأَيَـٰتِ|the Signs|82|90|1099$لَعَلَّكُم|so that you may|129|145|193$بِلِقَآءِ|in the meeting|115|131|5524$رَبِّكُمْ|(with) your Lord|127|143|490$تُوقِنُونَ|believe with certainty.|169|177|9317$

1711.verse: وَفِى|And in|62|72|487$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth|92|112|100$قِطَعٌ|are tracks|87|106|9321$مُّتَجَـٰوِرَٲتٌ|neighboring,|125|144|9322$وَجَنَّـٰتٌ|and gardens|101|120|3291$مِّنْ|of|50|70|53$أَعْنَـٰبٍ|grapevines|91|101|5887$وَزَرْعٌ|and crops|85|154|9323$وَنَخِيلٌ|and date-palms|123|260|9324$صِنْوَانٌ|trees (growing) from a single root|243|312|9325$وَغَيْرُ صِنْوَانٍ|and trees not (growing) from a single root.|304|359|9326$يُسْقَىٰ|watered|74|184|9327$بِمَآءٍ وَٲحِدٍ|with one water;|126|181|9328$وَنُفَضِّلُ|but We cause to exceed|183|191|9329$بَعْضَهَا|some of them|110|126|9330$عَلَىٰ|over|63|79|52$بَعْضٍ|others|76|92|1316$فِى|in|48|64|89$ٱلْأُكُلِ‌ۚ|the fruit.|79|95|9331$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|78|58$فِى|in|48|74|89$ذَٲلِكَ|that|64|116|28$لَأَيَـٰتٍ|surely (are) Signs|137|189|1434$لِّقَوْمٍ|for a people|99|151|1100$يَعْقِلُونَ|who use reason.|129|155|1435$

1712.verse: ۞ وَإِن|And if|102|110|213$تَعْجَبْ|you (are) astonished,|163|178|9332$فَعَجَبٌ|then astonishing|129|144|9333$قَوْلُهُمْ|(is) their saying,|129|144|7526$أَءِذَا|"When|62|77|9334$كُنَّا|we are|65|72|4361$تُرَٲبًا|dust,|66|74|9335$أَءِنَّا|will we|64|80|9336$لَفِى|(be) indeed, in|117|133|1513$خَلْقٍ|a creation|87|103|9337$جَدِيدٍ‌ۗ|new?"|67|83|9338$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|Those|82|98|51$ٱلَّذِينَ|(are) the ones who|148|156|20$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieved|92|105|59$بِرَبِّهِمْ‌ۖ|in their Lord,|104|130|5406$وَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|and those|96|122|55$ٱلْأَغْلَـٰلُ|the iron chains|118|144|9339$فِىٓ|(will be) in|89|115|89$أَعْنَاقِهِمْ‌ۖ|their necks,|98|111|9340$وَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|those|96|103|55$أَصْحَـٰبُ|(are the) companions|162|176|409$ٱلنَّارِ‌ۖ|(of) the Fire,|106|120|410$هُمْ|they|50|64|49$فِيهَا|in it|54|68|253$خَـٰلِدُونَ|(will) abide forever.|149|156|257$

1708.verse: Alif, Lam, Meem, Ra. These are the verses of the Book; and what has been revealed to you from your Lord is the truth, but most of the people do not believe.

1709.verse: It is Allah who erected the heavens without pillars that you [can] see; then He established Himself above the Throne and made subject the sun and the moon, each running [its course] for a specified term. He arranges [each] matter; He details the signs that you may, of the meeting with your Lord, be certain.

1710.verse: And it is He who spread the earth and placed therein firmly set mountains and rivers; and from all of the fruits He made therein two mates; He causes the night to cover the day. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.

1711.verse: And within the land are neighboring plots and gardens of grapevines and crops and palm trees, [growing] several from a root or otherwise, watered with one water; but We make some of them exceed others in [quality of] fruit. Indeed in that are signs for a people who reason.

1712.verse: And if you are astonished, [O Muhammad] - then astonishing is their saying, "When we are dust, will we indeed be [brought] into a new creation?" Those are the ones who have disbelieved in their Lord, and those will have shackles upon their necks, and those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally.
